english_example_sentence: If the tired guests leave quietly, the host will be happy.
russian_example_sentence: Если уставшие гости тихо уйдут, хозяин будет счастлив.
turkish_example_sentence: Eğer yorgun misafirler sessizce ayrılsalar, ev sahibi mutlu olur.
